Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2019 06:15PM TerrySB wrote: My liver mets returned after 6 years NED...I am bummed!!! Liver biopsy showed same cancer HER2+ same spot...one cell must have been asleep for 6 years and decided to wake up. Started on TDM1 and am ready for third dose this Friday, Finished 5 radiation sessions last Friday. Feeling absolutely crappy!!! Tired and short of breath...treated differently 6 years ago with Gemzar and Perjetta. Was on Herceptin and Perjetta for 6 years!!! and regular PET scan picked up new lesion. Feeling vulnerable right now....any advice?
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL

Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2019 04:10AM TerrySB wrote: TDM1 is a drug also called Kadcyla given IV. It is Herceptin plus another drug that acts similar to Chemo and has a lot of side effects (that I am feeling now!)
